text: Ingenuity was a small robotic solar helicopter on Mars as part of NASA's Mars 2020 mission. On 19 April 2021, it successfully completed the first powered controlled flight by an aircraft on a planet besides Earth, taking off vertically, hovering and landing. In January 2024, Ingenuity had retired after it got damaged. It made 72 flights. ==References== Category:NASA spacecraft Category:2020s in spaceflight
title: Ingenuity (helicopter)
